Description of Pipework/Area to be tested
The following procedure has been written as a working guide to ensure that hydrostatic pressure testing is carried out in a safe.
Changes to the procedure may be made by the Site Supervisor should additional safety measures be required to comply with site safety protocol
Test Pressure is to be 1350 Kpa for Sprinkler System
Test Pressure is to be 1350 Kpa for Fire Hydrant Systems
MINIMUM TEST PERIOD IS TO BE 2 HOURS
